name: DULL ACHE
description:
You are a lone skeleton wandering through a dungeon filled with prisoners who have lost their will to live. Escape by any means necessary or die trying.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

MOVE: ARROW-KEY

TALK/INTERACT: Z

BACK: X

A short game I made in about a week and a half to teach myself very basic concepts of game-making. It can be finished in about 15 to 20 min and has two different endings.

You can download the ROM for free to load into your emulator of choice.

All assets, sprites, music and writing by Diego García. Sweden, 2021.

Made with GB Studio.

Stay alive.
